| HistoryText             = The Black Choppers are a motorcycle gang comprised of space aliens, working at the behest of a secret, conspiratorial organization. They joined the first attack on [[Anthony Masters (Earth-616)|Taskmaster]]. Their symbol is the all-seeing eye at the top of a pyramid.{{r|Taskmaster Vol 2 1}}

The Black Choppers as an organization or a faction within the group, joined several other terrorist and criminal organizations or factions within those groups to form the [[Minions' International Liberation Front (Earth-616)|MILF]] whose goal was to take over the "Org" (unaware that it's actually a [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] handler).{{r|Taskmaster Vol 2 2}}
